video_prompt: Anime young woman's thoughtful gaze shifts slowly. Her flowing hair subtly sways. A blurred background figure subtly adjusts, subtly interacting with her shifting focus. Lighting softly brightens or dims, hinting at changing daytime.
image_prompt: Anime style, eye-level close-up portrait of a thoughtful young woman with warm amber eyes and long brown hair, wearing a mint green hoodie and black cap. She gazes slightly downwards to the right. A blurred young man is in the background to the left. Bright, soft daylight, white background, detailed eyelashes, natural blush.
refined_video_prompt: Eyes slowly redirect with a contemplative shift in expression. Strands of hair subtly sway and resettle around the face. In the background, an indistinct presence subtly adjusts, its faint motion subtly drawing the focus. Illumination softly brightens or dims, hinting at the passage of time.
